text:
We're developing some add-on code for JMeter to allow us to test a private 
protocol, so we don't want to include it with the normal JMeter source and 
binaries.

So we create a new Jar file - ApacheJMeter_addons.jar - which is placed in the 
lib/ext directory.

Enhancements can thus be tested without needing to do a full build, and the 
addons can be easily copied to others if required.

If applicable, in due course the code can be moved into the normal JMeter 
source tree.

In case the build file is useful for other developers, the attached files (to 
follow) can be added to the "extras" directory.

Hope the build-file proves useful.
creator: tjsb@slb.com
tjsb@slb.com
text:
Created attachment 7513
extras/addons.txt - description of building addons
